name: Material Dark Laravel Docs
description:
A Material Dark Theme for Laravel Docs. Based on Jetbrains Material theme.
Three themes available: Oceanic, Darker, Palenight
additional_info: Feel free to suggest some improvements. I won't change elements order or position, only colors and typo. Maybe a bigger typo in code blocks? If your eyes like it, I did the same on some other well-known websites with the same theme: https://userstyles.org/users/763420
